name: Level 1: Guided
title: Guided
description: This level is designed for younger children who need more supervision. Content is highly restricted, and parental approval is required for most activities.

name: Level 2: Independent
title: Independent
description: This level is suitable for children who are ready to explore more independently but may still need some guidance. They can access most content, but certain categories may be restricted.

name: Level 3: Autonomous
title: Autonomous
description: This level is for older children who have demonstrated responsible online behavior. They have access to almost all content, with minimal restrictions.
